entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Grand Falls-Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 6:30 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -17.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -23.7°C
Wind: WNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
